neighborhoods.Description: These central districts are rich in history and landmarks, with a mixture of business and residential properties.
Known for their creative scenes, these areas are filled with street art, hipster cafes, and indie boutiques.
Upscale, primarily residential areas with grand architecture, luxury shopping, and cultural institutions.
Vibrant and multicultural neighborhoods with a strong sense of community and a rich history of immigration.
Known for their LGBT-friendly atmosphere, these neighborhoods have a long history of counterculture and activism.
